attributes.name: Goal Tracker
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Goal Tracker card for personal objective management and achievement tracking in the Boxel framework. This card should help users set SMART goals, break them into actionable steps, track progress, and maintain motivation through visual progress indicators and achievement celebrations.

## Core Fields

### Goal Definition
- **goalTitle**: StringField - Clear, specific goal name
- **description**: MarkdownField - Detailed goal explanation
- **category**: StringField with enum: "health", "career", "education", "finance", "relationships", "personal-growth", "hobbies", "travel"
- **priority**: StringField with enum: "low", "medium", "high", "critical"
- **status**: StringField with enum: "planning", "active", "paused", "completed", "abandoned"
- **type**: StringField with enum: "outcome", "process", "habit", "project", "learning"

### SMART Goal Framework
- **specific**: MarkdownField - What exactly will be accomplished
- **measurable**: contains(MeasurementCriteria) - How progress will be measured
- **achievable**: MarkdownField - Why this goal is realistic
- **relevant**: MarkdownField - Why this goal matters
- **timeBound**: contains(Timeline) - When goal will be completed
- **smartScore**: NumberField - SMART criteria completeness (computed)

### Timeline & Milestones
- **startDate**: DateField - Goal initiation date
- **targetDate**: DateField - Planned completion date
- **actualCompletionDate**: DateField - When actually completed
- **milestones**: containsMany(Milestone) - Key progress markers
- **deadlines**: containsMany(Deadline) - Important dates
- **checkpoints**: containsMany(Checkpoint) - Regular review dates
- **timeRemaining**: NumberField - Days until deadline (computed)

### Progress Tracking
- **currentProgress**: NumberField - Progress percentage 0-100
- **targetMetric**: NumberField - Goal target value
- **currentValue**: NumberField - Current achievement level
- **progressHistory**: containsMany(ProgressEntry) - Historical tracking
- **updateFrequency**: StringField - Daily, weekly, monthly
- **lastUpdated**: DateTimeField - Most recent progress update

### Action Plan
- **actionSteps**: containsMany(ActionStep) - Tasks to complete goal
- **prerequisites**: containsMany(Prerequisite) - Required before starting
- **resources**: containsMany(Resource) - Tools, people, materials needed
- **obstacles**: containsMany(Obstacle) - Potential challenges
- **strategies**: containsMany(Strategy) - How to overcome obstacles
- **accountability**: linksToMany(Contact) - People who will help

### Motivation & Tracking
- **whyImportant**: MarkdownField - Personal motivation
- **benefits**: containsMany(Benefit) - Expected positive outcomes
- **consequences**: MarkdownField - Cost of not achieving
- **visualizations**: containsMany(Visualization) - Mental imagery
- **rewards**: containsMany(Reward) - Celebration plans
- **motivationLevel**: NumberField - Current motivation 1-10

### Related Information
- **subgoals**: containsMany(Subgoal) - Smaller component goals
- **parentGoal**: linksTo(Goal) - Larger goal this supports
- **relatedGoals**: linksToMany(Goal) - Connected objectives
- **habits**: linksToMany(Habit) - Supporting daily practices
- **projects**: linksToMany(Project) - Related projects
- **skills**: linksToMany(Skill) - Skills being developed

### Reflection & Learning
- **journalEntries**: containsMany(GoalJournal) - Reflection notes
- **lessonsLearned**: containsMany(Lesson) - Insights gained
- **adjustments**: containsMany(GoalAdjustment) - Changes made
- **setbacks**: containsMany(Setback) - Challenges encountered
- **breakthroughs**: containsMany(Breakthrough) - Major progress
- **successFactors**: containsMany(SuccessFactor) - What worked well

## Required Component Cards

### ActionStep Card
Create a separate ActionStep card with:
- **stepTitle**: StringField - Action item name
- **description**: MarkdownField - Detailed task description
- **estimatedTime**: NumberField - Expected hours/days
- **actualTime**: NumberField - Time actually spent
- **dueDate**: DateField - Step deadline
- **status**: StringField - Not started, in progress, complete
- **priority**: StringField - High, medium, low
- **difficulty**: NumberField - Complexity rating 1-10
- **dependencies**: linksToMany(ActionStep) - Prerequisites
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Additional context

### Milestone Card
- **milestoneName**: StringField - Milestone title
- **targetDate**: DateField - When to achieve
- **actualDate**: DateField - When actually achieved
- **significance**: MarkdownField - Why this milestone matters
- **celebrationPlan**: StringField - How to celebrate
- **progressPercentage**: NumberField - Goal completion at this point
- **evidence**: containsMany(FileField) - Proof of achievement
- **reflection**: MarkdownField - Lessons from reaching milestone

### ProgressEntry Card
- **entryDate**: DateField - Progress update date
- **currentValue**: NumberField - Measurement at this time
- **progressPercentage**: NumberField - Completion percentage
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Progress observations
- **mood**: NumberField - Motivation level 1-10
- **challenges**: StringField - Current obstacles
- **wins**: StringField - Recent successes
- **nextSteps**: StringField - Upcoming actions

## Computed Fields Logic

### Progress Percentage
(Current Value / Target Value) Ã— 100 = Progress percentage.

### Days Remaining
Target Date - Current Date = Days until deadline.

### Velocity Calculation
Recent progress rate to predict completion date.

### SMART Score
Percentage of SMART criteria completed (5 criteria, 20% each).

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design an inspiring goal management interface:

**Header Section**
- Goal title prominently displayed
- Progress ring/bar showing completion
- Days remaining countdown
- Status badge and priority indicator
- Quick actions: Update Progress, Add Step

**Progress Dashboard**
- **Visual Progress Display**:
  - Large circular progress indicator
  - Current vs. target metrics
  - Progress trend chart
  - Milestone timeline
  - Achievement badges
  
- **Key Statistics**:
  - Days since started
  - Time remaining
  - Completion percentage
  - Average progress rate
  - Next milestone

**Goal Details Panel**
- SMART goal breakdown
- Why this goal matters
- Expected benefits
- Success criteria
- Resources needed

**Action Plan Section**
- **Next Actions**:
  - Immediate next steps
  - Upcoming deadlines
  - Overdue items (if any)
  - Quick task completion
  
- **Action Steps List**:
  - Completed steps (checked off)
  - In-progress items
  - Future actions
  - Step dependencies
  - Time estimates

**Progress Tracking**
- Progress entry form
- Historical progress chart
- Milestone achievement timeline
- Photo progress documentation
- Voice note updates

**Motivation Section**
- Personal why statement
- Visualization images
- Accountability partners
- Reward reminders
- Inspirational quotes

### Fitted View Layout
- Goal title and category icon
- Progress ring indicator
- Days remaining
- Next action item
- Last update date
- Quick progress update

### Mobile Goal App View
- Swipe through goals
- Quick progress updates
- Photo documentation
- Voice notes
- Push notifications

## Interactive Features

### Progress Updates
- Slider for percentage progress
- Photo before/after
- Voice note updates
- Quick check-ins
- Measurement logging

### Gamification
- Achievement badges
- Progress streaks
- Level-up celebrations
- Social sharing
- Leaderboards (if desired)

### Smart Suggestions
- AI-powered next actions
- Deadline reminders
- Progress insights
- Resource recommendations
- Motivation boosters

## Styling Requirements
- Motivational design aesthetic
- Progress visualization focus
- Energizing color scheme
- Achievement celebration UI
- Mobile-optimized interface
- Dark mode support
- Accessibility features
- Customizable themes

## Validation Rules
- Goal title required and meaningful
- Target date must be in future
- Progress values within 0-100%
- SMART criteria completeness
- Action steps have due dates
- Milestones chronologically ordered
- Realistic timeframes
- Measurable criteria defined

## Integration Points
- **Calendar Apps**: Deadline and milestone sync
- **Habit Trackers**: Supporting habit integration
- **Fitness Apps**: Health goal tracking
- **Finance Apps**: Financial goal monitoring
- **Learning Platforms**: Educational goals
- **Social Media**: Achievement sharing
- **Productivity Apps**: Task management
- **Journaling Apps**: Reflection integration
- **Photography**: Progress documentation
- **Wearables**: Automated progress tracking

## Business Logic Requirements
- Intelligent goal breakdown suggestions
- Progress prediction algorithms
- Deadline adjustment recommendations
- Motivation reminder scheduling
- Accountability partner notifications
- Progress celebration triggers
- Setback recovery guidance
- Goal interconnection analysis
- Time management optimization
- Resource allocation suggestions
- Success pattern recognition
- Failure analysis and learning
- Goal prioritization assistance
- Life balance monitoring
